text: "I Will Always Love You" is a song by American singer-songwriter Dolly Parton. It is a country music song. It was released on June 6, 1974. It was the second single from Parton's thirteenth solo album, Jolene (1974). Whitney Houston recorded a version of the song for the movie The Bodyguard in 1992. That version is one of the best selling singles of all time. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Country songs Category:Country ballads Category:Pop songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul songs Category:Soul ballads Category:R&B; songs Category:R&B; ballads Category:Whitney Houston songs Category:Dolly Parton songs Category:Lara Fabian songs Category:Vince Gill songs
title: I Will Always Love You
